operation.command: update BGEN.CIVILP set ETARAD = 'E' where ETACAF = '02018000007994'
select 1 from sgengpp.gpp_personne_physique p where p.numero_interne = 2018000007994 and p.radie = true and p.decede = false and p.motif_radiation = 'ERREUR_SAISIE'
update BGEN.CIVILP set ETARAD = ' ' where ETACAF = '02018000007994'
